body_html:
@mrry haha. I believe the way you suggested is correct as I've seen folks using -c opt. Sorry derailing this thread. I was going to try with -c opt but just faced another issue so might take a little but I can follow up after if you want.
update: with -c opt still got the same error.

body:
@mrry haha. I believe the way you suggested is correct as I've seen folks using `-c opt`. Sorry derailing this thread. I was going to try with `-c opt` but just faced another [issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7871#issuecomment-282532359) so might take a little but I can follow up after if you want.
**update**: with `-c opt` still got the same error.
